ygData.subject: RE: Guise of the Deceiver
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I play a Barbarian Shaman as well and I have a guise. And I have to say here that I don t think it s unfair that other races can equip it.  Have you ever
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I play a Barbarian Shaman as well and I have a guise.
And I have to say here that I don't think it's unfair that other races can
equip it. Have you ever tried to zone from Guk or Sol B when there is a
Troll, Ogre or Barbarian in your way? As a Shaman, I can shrink, but for
the others, being small was of HUGE importance in a dungeon... not to
mention the ultravision benefit. Anyway, I'm fine with the change, but
don't think it was necessary.

Tani 17th Bard
Halana 39th Shaman
Solusek Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@...
[mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 5:54 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Guise of the
Deceiver

From: <kim@...>

On Wed, 8 Dec 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> They actually fixed the no equip = no
usage problem? That might be the
> single biggest Enhancement Verant has made
to date. Is it still No Drop I
> wonder?

Well, they didn't fix it. They made a new
item. The old
guises still work without being equipped,
much to the chagrin
of the non-bard/rogue non-powerlevelers.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
